value.title: Visually see where you BROKE the fold in Power Query
value.excerpt: Rule #1 - DON'T BREAK THE FOLD! There is an amazing feature that lets you see where this fold was broken, and I'm guessing you didn't even know it was there!  Adam shows you where to go.  Query plan for Power Query (Preview) https://learn.microsoft.com/power-query/query-plan  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?

value.title: What's a Junk Dimension and when should you use it?

value.title: When optimizing Power BI don't forgot about CPU
value.excerpt: We talk about optimizations a LOT! We pile onto a question posed by Chris Webb - Should you optimize for CPU in Power BI? We think the answer is YES! Let's explain...  Chris Webb's Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2021/09/19/why-you-should-optimise-your-power-bi-premium-reports-and-refreshes-for-cpu-time-as-well-as-duration/
